sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.itil_mobile" name="Mobile Device ITIL and Service Management" state="published" help="Mobile_Device_ITIL_and_Service_Management_Plugin" version="1.0.0" licensable="true" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>Applications and modules for ITIL and Service Management</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.labels"/> <import plugin="com.glide.mobile"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Applications and modules for ITIL and Service Management</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Mobile_Device_ITIL_and_Service_Management_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.itil_mobile</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Mobile Device ITIL and Service Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.itil_mobile/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.labels,com.glide.mobile</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.itil_mobile</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
